complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Analyze Existing Jekyll Site Structure and Content
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the analysis into subtasks: (1) Crawl and map all site URLs, (2) Document layouts in _layouts/, (3) Inventory includes in _includes/, (4) Catalog data files in _data/, (5) List all assets (images, PDFs, downloads), (6) Analyze navigation and content structure, (7) Document responsive breakpoints and forms.app iframe usage.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task requires a comprehensive technical and content audit of a live Jekyll site, involving automated crawling, manual inspection, and detailed documentation of multiple site components. The breadth of analysis across structure, assets, and responsive behavior increases complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Study Credential Engine Inspiration Site Design System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks: (1) Analyze color palette, (2) Document typography and heading hierarchy, (3) Map navigation and footer structures, (4) Extract layout patterns from key pages, (5) Document responsive behavior, (6) Compile design specification document.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves systematic design analysis and documentation, requiring both technical inspection and design interpretation across multiple site areas. The need for precision in extracting design tokens and patterns adds to the complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create New Design System and Component Library
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into subtasks: (1) Define color variables, (2) Establish typography scale, (3) Set spacing units, (4) Create component styles, (5) Implement CSS custom properties, (6) Build modular SCSS architecture, (7) Ensure accessibility compliance, (8) Design responsive grid and breakpoints.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Developing a design system and component library is a high-complexity task, requiring deep technical and design expertise, modular architecture, accessibility, and responsive design considerations.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Redesign Site Navigation and Header Component
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into: (1) Refactor header include, (2) Redesign navigation structure, (3) Implement dropdown menus, (4) Add responsive hamburger menu, (5) Ensure semantic HTML and ARIA, (6) Style navigation, (7) Test accessibility and keyboard navigation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Navigation redesign involves both frontend engineering and accessibility, requiring careful handling of responsive and interactive elements, semantic markup, and cross-device testing.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: (1) Organize footer link categories, (2) Implement responsive layout, (3) Add semantic markup, (4) Include contact and social links, (5) Style footer for consistency.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: While less complex than navigation, the footer redesign still requires structured organization, responsive design, and semantic markup, but with fewer interactive elements.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Modernize Homepage with Professional Hero Section
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into: (1) Redesign hero section, (2) Select and optimize imagery, (3) Implement headline and value proposition, (4) Add content highlights (tools, events, metrics), (5) Ensure semantic HTML5 structure, (6) Optimize images for performance.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Homepage redesign is high-impact and requires careful layout, content strategy, image optimization, and accessibility, but is focused on a single page.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: (1) Redesign tools landing page, (2) Update dashboards page, (3) Refactor Jupyter Notebooks page, (4) Update methodology page, (5) Test responsive layouts and embedded content.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This involves updating several related pages with consistent layouts and ensuring all embedded content and links remain functional, requiring moderate complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Redesign Resources Section with Publication Layouts
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into: (1) Redesign resources landing page, (2) Update technical report page, (3) Implement publication categorization, (4) Create card/list layouts, (5) Validate links and downloads.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Redesigning publication layouts and ensuring proper categorization and download functionality involves both design and content management, but is limited in scope.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Redesign Events Section with Past and Future Events
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: (1) Redesign events landing page, (2) Update event subpages, (3) Implement upcoming/past event distinction, (4) Apply card-based layout, (5) Test date formatting and responsiveness.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task requires organizing and redesigning event listings, with attention to chronological order and responsive design, but is relatively contained.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into: (1) Redesign overview page, (2) Update team page with profiles, (3) Refactor data partners page, (4) Update contact page, (5) Ensure accessibility for images and forms.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Multiple about pages require layout updates and accessibility improvements, but the content is mostly static and organizational.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: (1) Redesign privacy policy page, (2) Update terms and conditions page, (3) Refactor accessibility statement page for consistency.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Legal pages are mostly static content requiring consistent styling and semantic markup, with minimal interactive or structural complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into: (1) Conduct accessibility audit, (2) Add alt text to images, (3) Implement ARIA labels, (4) Ensure semantic HTML5, (5) Test keyboard navigation, (6) Add skip links and focus management, (7) Validate color contrast.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Comprehensive accessibility improvements require technical audits, code changes across the site, and extensive testing, making this a high-complexity task.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Optimize Responsive Design and Mobile Experience
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: (1) Test and refine breakpoints, (2) Implement flexible grid systems, (3) Optimize touch targets, (4) Ensure typography scaling, (5) Test navigation on mobile, (6) Optimize images and performance.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Optimizing for responsive and mobile experience requires cross-device testing, layout adjustments, and performance tuning, involving both design and technical skills.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Preserve and Test All Existing Functionality
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into: (1) Test all internal links, (2) Verify external links, (3) Test forms and embeds, (4) Check URL redirects, (5) Validate downloadable resources, (6) Test cross-page navigation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Comprehensive regression testing across all site functionality is critical and requires systematic coverage of links, forms, assets, and navigation.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Final Design Alignment Verification and Launch Preparation
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: (1) Conduct side-by-side design comparison, (2) Verify design consistency, (3) Perform cross-browser testing, (4) Run accessibility audit, (5) Test mobile performance, (6) Validate asset loading, (7) Prepare deployment checklist and backups.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Final verification and launch prep require thorough multi-dimensional testing, visual regression, and deployment readiness, demanding high attention to detail and coordination.
